snippet: In a dispute between Dick Clark Productions and the Hollywood Foreign Press Association, a district court judge ruled that the production company was within its rights to agree to keep the Globes on NBC through 2018.
abstract: In a dispute between Dick Clark Productions and the Hollywood Foreign Press Association, a district court judge ruled that the production company was within its rights to agree to keep the Globes on NBC through 2018.

headline.main: Judge Rules Golden Globes-NBC Deal Was Proper
headline.print_headline: Golden Globes Can Stay On NBC, Judge Rules
